participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and confident, Ethan is driven by success and luxury. He enjoys discussing finance and future plans.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Liam Foster
participant_2.personality: Liam is down-to-earth and practical. He enjoys life in the country and values hard work and simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i am an electrician.

content.text: Hey! Do you drive a BMW?
